ygData.subject: Gypsy Medallion
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question about Gypsy Medallion : AC 2, +9 cha, +10 disease. Supposedly it s off Korvick the Cursed in North Karana. Anybody have further details -
ygData.messageBody:
I have a question about Gypsy Medallion : AC 2, +9 cha, +10 disease.
Supposedly it's off Korvick the Cursed in North Karana. Anybody have further
details - where does he spawn, placeholder, is he rare spawn ?, is it rare drop ?,
or any other suggestions. I'm planning to wear a plat cat's eye necklace when
I can make plat jewellry, but that's only +9 cha. Seems like Gypsy Medallion is
the very best neck item for enchanters. True ?

I'm currently wearing a Split Paw Tooth Necklace AC 2, +5 cha, +5 poison.

Thanks,
Mohini,
28 enchanter on Fenin Ro.
